title: Espresso
description: Rich, bold single shot. No milk, pure coffee flavour.

title: Cappuccino
description: Espresso with steamed milk and froth, perfectly balanced.

title: Caramel Latte
description: Smooth latte with caramel syrup and microfoam.

title: Classic Cold Coffee
description: Blended coffee with milk, sugar & ice cream.

title: Mocha Frappe
description: Cold coffee with chocolate, whipped cream on top.

title: Masala Chai
description: Indian spiced tea brewed with milk & aromatic spices.

title: Lemon Ginger Tea
description: Refreshing lemon tea with a hint of ginger.

title: Grilled Veg Sandwich
description: Stuffed with veggies, cheese & house special sauce.

title: Peri Peri Fries
description: Crispy fries tossed in spicy peri peri seasoning.

title: Chocolate Brownie
description: Warm gooey brownie, best with a cappuccino.

title: Cheesecake Slice
description: Creamy baked cheesecake with biscuit base.
